attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Banks should be made more accountable for their irresponsible practice's. Through their greed and lack of 'duty of care'with our money they have managed to plunge economies into recession. Why isn't Gordon Brown Jumping up and down demanding answers.

rejection.details: Please make your title a call for action, not a name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
